img_above_text:
![Wukong Lanxi 25.jpg](https://oyster.ignimgs.com/mediawiki/apis.ign.com/black-myth-wukong/7/7f/Wukong_Lanxi_25.jpg)
However, if you don't see the legs gleam when she spreads them wide, it will be a feint attack, and she'll quickly raise a single talon high that will gleam alone, before slamming it down on your position.
img_below_text:
When she starts growling while taking a step back and shaking her body madly, that's your cue to retreat to a safe distance to avoid a spew of poison projectiles in the area in front of her.
![Wukong Lanxi 26.jpg](https://oyster.ignimgs.com/mediawiki/apis.ign.com/black-myth-wukong/0/07/Wukong_Lanxi_26.jpg)

        Your task:
        1. Generate a **short, clear, and informative English summary** of the image.

img_summary: The image depicts a boss battle in *Black Myth: Wukong* against "The Second Sister," a large spider-like creature. The player character, armed with a glowing red weapon, is engaged in combat within a dark, eerie environment featuring overgrown vegetation and traditional architecture. The preceding text discusses the boss's feint attack mechanics, while the following text warns of a poison projectile attack triggered by her growling and body movements. The image visually complements these gameplay strategies by showcasing the intense encounter.
